name: Sanctified Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Relic of the Water
description: Cleanse conditions from yourself and nearby allies after using a healing skill.

name: Shred of Secrets of the Obscure Mastery
description: Grants a small amount of Secrets of the Obscure Mastery experience.

name: Enchanted Owl Griffon Skin
description: Double-click to unlock this griffon mount skin for your account.

name: Receipt for Infused Skyscale Egg
description: Obtained by speaking to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne after infusing the skyscale egg with every magic on her list.

name: Relic of Vampirism
description: Siphon life from nearby foes when you use a healing skill. Restore a portion of your maximum health upon killing a foe.

name: Deluxe Gear Box
description: Double-click to open.

name: Fractured Fish
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Mini Lyhr
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Jeweled Amulet
description: An old sapphire amulet, weathered by frequent use. It went missing when the Wizard's Tower left the Kessex Hills.

name: Relic of the Afflicted
description: Create a Death Nova at a foe's location upon their defeat that inflicts poison and bleeding.

name: Relic of the Unseen Invasion
description: Grant yourself and nearby allies superspeed when you enter or exit stealth.

name: Sorcerer's Cape Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Arcanum of Astral Thought
description: Can be combined by a skilled crafter with a Gift of Magical Prosperity, Gift of Stormy Skies, and Gift of Expertise within the Wizard's Tower to create legendary armor.

name: Infernal Envoy Backpack Skin
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Mini Mabon
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Infernal Envoy Glider Skin
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Tall Academic Arch
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Sky-Chak Drone
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Rift Hunter Glove Box
description:
Double-click to open.
Choose a weight class of Rift Hunter armor.

name: Skyscale Comforts List
description: Obtained by speaking to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne after acquiring a skyscale egg.

name: Upgraded Comms Device (Experimental)
description: This jade tech service chip will upgrade the user's comms device with Taimi's latest firmware update.

name: Ancient Astral Ward Manual
description: This document was recently uncovered at Rata Pten. Someone there may already be trying to translate it. The information inside cannot get out to the public.

name: Simple Stool
description: Double-click to add to wardrobe.

name: Transcribed Jotun Runestone
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Unstable Magic Volley
description: Unlocks the Unstable Magic Volley skill for use while gliding throughout maps around the Horn of Maguuma.

name: Relic of the Reaper
description: Chill nearby enemies after executing a <c=@abilitytype>shout</c> skill.

name: Cosmic Mining Tool
description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

name: Strength Fish
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Relic of the Pack
description: Grant superspeed, might, and fury to nearby allies after using an elite skill.

name: IX: The Stag
description: The stag has fought long, lost much, and worked her craft where the ghost of their mentor dwelt.

name: "/Heroic" Emote Tome
description: Consuming this tome will give you access to a new emote!

name: I: The Forager
description: Intellect, willpower, and fortitude are the hallmarks of the Forager; and if one needs to broaden their intellect, one must go to where it is stored.

name: XIX: Sunrise
description: Positivity, optimism, an inquisitive soul; they know more than anyone but need a guiding hand. Help her put the pieces back where they belong.

name: Analytical Charm
description: Collects possible Kryptis-related data on any nearby skyscales.

name:
Celiix the Forgiven
620 Dusk IVXX
Strength
Plush Quaggan
description: <c=flavor>"For a young one, you can't go wrong with a quaggan plush. They're perfectly squishy and huggable!"</c>

name: IV: The Mirror
description: The mirror looks at himself and sees benevolence, but under that veil is something more modest. Insecure. The world around him swirls awake, but his has remained stagnant.

name: Relic of Vass
description: After using a healing or elixir skill, your next few attacks inflict poison. <c=@reminder>Healing skills can only trigger this effect once every interval.</c>

name: Large Pinch of Stardust
description: Double-click to add 5 Pinches of Stardust to your wallet.

name: Earthshaker Mining Tool
description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

name: Receipt for Skyscale Comforts
description: Obtained by speaking to Skyscale Trainer Dyanne after acquiring all of the skyscale comfort items on her list.

name: Relic of Resistance
description: Gain resistance after using a healing skill.

name: Relic Chest
description: Double-click to choose a relic container.

name: Mini Avatar of Envy
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Rift Hunter Headgear Box
description:
Double-click to open.
Choose a weight class of Rift Hunter armor.

name: Possession Infusion
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Possesses your spirit with influence from Nayos.

name: Vermilion Mining Tool
description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

name: XVIII: Twilight
description: Something hidden, the veil obscures, a language unspoken... In the darkness, she was born again.

name: Bird Whistle
description: A baby skyscale would enjoy this.

name: Deluxe Gear Box
description: Double-click to open.

name: II: The Minister Illuminate
description: To learn answers of the obscure, one must ask a thousand questions. Search the halls of a place where you may seek those answers. Or, perhaps, even more questions.

name: Deluxe Gear Box
description: Double-click to open.

name: XVI: The Tower of Secrets
description: Chaos and destruction, the last bastion against the void. Every door holds more questions. Reach the top of the tower and unravel them yourself.

name: Mini Isgarren
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Natural Fish
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Sanctified Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Relic of the Aristocracy
description: Gain increased condition duration when inflicting weakness or vulnerability on a foe.

name: Gift of Expertise
description: Used in crafting legendary items.

name: Ogden's Parcel
description: Given to you by Ogden Stonehealer, you need to deliver this to a Priory Researcher in Lornar's Pass.

name: Cerus's Coffer
description: Double-click to open.

name: Elonian Sandpaper
description: Skyscale saddle component.

name: Academic Light
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Bag of Coins (1 Gold)
description: Double-click to open.

name: Rift Hunter Leggings Box
description:
Double-click to open.
Choose a weight class of Rift Hunter armor.

name: Sanctified Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Relic of Evasion
description: Gain vigor after evading an attack.

name: Codmander
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Relic of the Zephyrite
description: Summon crystals that apply protection and resolution to allies after using an elite skill. Crystal duration scales with the recharge of the used skill.

name: Saddlebag of Holding
description: Skyscale saddle component.

name: Obscure Fish
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Relic of the Holosmith
description: Create a laser disk after you use an elite skill.

name: Jade-Spun Silk Thread
description: Skyscale saddle component.

name: Mini Avatar of Despair
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: V: The Weeping Mountain
description: The rock we all stand on, this unshakable driving force... It will take a special kind of soul to guide us forward. A warden, protecting his flock.

name: Possession Infusion
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Possesses your spirit with influence from Nayos.

name: Possession Infusion
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Possesses your spirit with influence from Nayos.

name: Relic of the Thief
description: Upon striking an enemy with a weapon skill that has a recharge or resource cost, gain increased strike damage. <c=@reminder>When this triggers, refresh the duration of all stacks.</c>

name: Glacial Mining Tool
description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

name: Relic of the Deadeye
description: Deal increased strike damage for a duration when you use a <c=@abilitytype>cantrip</c> skill.

name: "/Possessed" Emote Tome
description: Consuming this tome will give you access to a new emote!

name: Relic Container: Survival
description: Double-click to choose a relic.

name: Amalgamated Rift Essence
description:
An amalgamation of rift essences used for crafting.
The recipe can be purchased from Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.

name: X: Satchel of Fate
description: Questions and answers, the everlasting cycle. If only one could forge a key to all the answers...

name: Sanctified Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Gift of Mighty Prosperity
description: Used to craft legendary Obsidian boots, gloves, and leggings.

name: Relic of the Defender
description: Heal a percentage of your maximum health after blocking an attack. If you block again within 5 seconds, you heal less each time down to a minimum of 1%.

name: Wizard's Tower Teleportation Scroll
description: An unassuming scroll covered in thin green lines that seem to glow slightly when touched. Use to teleport to the Wizard's Tower.

name: Rare Rift Motivation
description: Double-click to track tier 3 rifts. This overrides other motivations. If you're already tracking tier 3 rifts, using this item removes the effect. Apply to the rift to increase essence gains on closure.

name: Relic of Dagda
description: After using an elite skill, fire a projectile at the target or nearest enemy that damages and inflicts conditions. Damage scales with the recharge of the elite skill.
